CustomField.description: Label for the Favorites (e.g Quick Buys, Pre-defined Solutions, Saved Configurations, Templates, etc..). If empty, it would default to "Favorites"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Label for the Favorites (e.g Quick Buys, Pre-defined Solutions, Saved Configurations, Templates, etc..). If empty, it would default to "Favorites"
CustomField.label: Favorites Display Label
